entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the morning and 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
